topic.domains: (topic hi-d) (topic ut-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic struct-d) (topic firmware-d) (topic pmcrevhis-d) a(props sp-version) a(props pmc_switch) a(props pmc_package) a(props pmc_phy) a(props ddr-width) a(props package) a(props fw_package) a(props pcie-drive-ports ) a(props pcie-host-ports) a(props raid-support ) a(props sas-ports ) a(props media) a(props component)
topic.title: Defects and Defect Correlation

body.p: Some functional layers are split between the ENET and MAPOTN subsystems. The following tables list all the defects and defect correlation supported by the ENET subsystem as well as Ethernet defects supported by the MAPOTN subsystem.

entry.p: Server Signal Fail (Per OTN demapped client)
Activation: PHY_RX is not available and PHY_TX is not shutdown.
Deactivation: PHY_RX is available or PHY_TX is shutdown.
Loss of Signal Defect Correlation (Per SERDES)
Activation: 3 or more local fault sequence within 128 columns.
Deactivation: 0 local fault sequence within 128 columns or new fault sequence detected.
Forward Defect Indication Defect Correlation (Per PHY)
Activation: 3 or more remote fault seuqnece within 128 columns.
Deactivation: 0 remote fault sequence within 128 columns or new fault sequence detected.
Loss of Signal Defect Correlation (Per PHY)
Loss of Block Lock (Per PCS lane)
Activation: Received 65 or more sync header errors within 1024 consecutive sync headers.
Deactivation: Received 64 consecutive good sync headers.
Reg name: BLOCKLOCK, BLOCKLOCKALL, LOBL_I, LOBL_INTR_I
Activation: Received 16 or more sync header errors within 64 consecutive sync headers.
Deactivation: Received 64 consecutive good sync headers.
Loss of Character Synchronization of 66B blocks (Per FlexE (sub)group or per FlexE client).
Activation: Received 65 or more sync header errors within 1024 consecutive sync headers.
Deactivation: Received 64 consecutive good sync headers.
Loss of Character Synchronization of 66B blocks (Per PCS lane)
Activation: loss of block lock for 3ms.
NOT SUPPORTED, done per channel, not per PCS lane.
Loss of Character Synchronization of 66B blocks (Per FlexE (sub)group or per FlexE client)
Activation: loss of block lock for 3ms.
OLD amendment 3 version of G.798. Superseded.
Loss of Character Synchronization of 66b blocks Defect Correlation (Per PHY)
Loss of Character Synchronization of 66b blocks Defect Correlation (Per FlexE (sub)group or per FlexE client)
cLCS <- dLCS and (not dCSUM) and (not dCSF) and (not dPLM) and (not AI_TSF)
Loss of Character Synchronization of 66b blocks Defect Correlation (Per FlexE (sub)group or per FlexE client)
cLCS <- dLCS and and (not dPLM) and (not AI_TSF)
Loss of Alignment Marker (Per PCS lane)
Activation: Received N consecutive AM errors. N=4 for rate up to 100G, N=5 for 200G and 400G.
Reg name: AMLOCK, AMLOCKALL, LOAM_I, LOAM_INTR_I
Loss of Alignment Marker (Per FlexE (sub)group or per FlexE client)
Activation: Received N consecutive AM errors. N=4 for rate up to 100G, N=5 for 200G and 400G.
Loss of PCS Lane Signal (Per PCS lane)
Activation: lost of alignment marker lock for 3ms.
Deactivation: achieved alignment marker lock for 3ms.
NOT SUPPORTED, done per channel, not per PCS lane.
Loss of PCS Lane Signal Defect Correlation (Per PHY)
cLOL <- dLOL and (not dPMM) and (not dGIDM) and (not CI_SSF)
Activation: detected n or more bit errors in a x window.
Deactivation: number of bit error smaller than n in a x window.
High Bit Error Rate (Per PCS lane)
Activation: BER is greater than threshold within measuring window.
Deactivation:BER is equal or smaller than threshold within measuring window.
High Sync Error Rate (Per FEC lane)
Activation: SER is greater than threshold within measuring window.
Deactivation:SER is equal or smaller than threshold within measuring window.
FlexE Out of Frame (Per FlexE PHY)
Activation: sync header, control block type or O code do not match at the expected position for 5 occurrences.
De-activation: sync header, control block type or O code match followed by a second one at the expected position.
Activation: sync header, control block type or O code do not match at the expected position for 5 occurrences on one or more of the PHY within the FlexE (sub)group.
De-activation: sync header, control block type or O code match followed by a second one at the expected position for all PHYs within the FlexE (sub)group.
Loss of FlexE Frame (Per FlexE PHY)
Activation: Loss of FlexE frame lock (FLEXE_OOFLANE=1) for 3ms.
Deactivation: Achieved FlexE frame lock (FLEXE_OOFLANE=0) for 3ms.
Activation: Loss of FlexE frame lock (FLEXE_OOF=1) for 3ms .
Deactivation: Achieved FlexE frame lock (FLEXE_OOF=0) for 3ms.
Loss of FlexE Frame Defect Correlation (Per FlexE PHY)
cFLEXE_LOFLANE <- dFLEXE_LOFLANE and (not dLOL) and (not dLOPS) and (not dLCS) and (not AI_TSF)
Loss of FlexE Frame Defect Correlation (Per FlexE (sub)group)
cFLEXE_LOF <- dFLEXE_LOF and (not dLCS) and (not dCUSM) and (not dCSF) and (not dPLM) and (not AI_TSF)
FlexE Out of Multiframe (Per FlexE PHY)
Activation: OMF bit do not transition as expected with 2 consecutive FlexE frames with good CRC.
De-activation: OMF transition as expected with 2 consecutive FlexE frames with good CRC.
Activation: OMF bit do not transition as expected with 2 consecutive FlexE frames with good CRC on at least one of the PHY within the FlexE (sub)group.
De-activation: OMF transition as expected with 2 consecutive FlexE frames with good CRC on all PHYs within the FlexE (sub)group.
Loss of FlexE Overhead Multiframe (Per FlexE PHY)
Activation: Out of FlexE overhead multiframe alignment (FLEXE_OOMLANE=1) for 10ms.
Deactivation: Achieved FlexE overhead multiframe alignment (FLEXE_OOMLANE=0) .
Loss of FlexE Overhead Multiframe.(Per FlexE (sub)group)
Activation: Out of FlexE overhead multiframe alignment (FLEXE_OOM=1) for 10ms.
Deactivation: Achieved FlexE overhead multiframe alignment (FLEXE_OOM=0) .
FlexE Loss of Multiframe Defect Correlation (Per FlexE (sub)group)
Activation: Loss of FlexE PHY alignment.
FlexE Loss of Alignment Defect Correlation (Per FlexE (sub)group)
cFLEXE_LOL <- dFLEXE_LOL and (not dPMM) and (not dGIDM) and (not dLOM) and (not AI_TSF).
FlexE Loss of Alignment Defect Correlation (Per FlexE (sub)group)
cFLEXE_LOL <- dFLEXE_LOL and (not dPMM) and (not dGIDM) and (not CI_SSF).
FlexE Group Identifier Mismatch (Per FlexE PHY)
Activation: the accepted group identifier is different than the expected group identifier.
Deactivation: the accepted group identifier is equal to the expected group identifier.
Activation: the accepted group identifier is different than the expected group identifier. dFLEXE_GIDM is declared within 100ms of change to the accepted group ID.
Deactivation: the accepted group identifier is equal to the expected group identifier.
FlexE Group Identifier Mismatch Defect Correlation (Per FlexE (sub)group)
cFLEXE_GIDM <- dFLEXE_GIDM and (not dLOM) and (not AI_TSF)
FlexE Group Identifier Mismatch Defect Correlation (Per FlexE (sub)group)
Activation: the accepted PHY identifier is different than the expected PHY identifier.
Deactivation: the accepted PHY identifier is equal to the expected PHY identifier.
Activation: the accepted PHY Map is inconsistent with the expected PHY Map.
Deactivation: the accepted PHY Map is identical to the expected PHY Map.
Activation: .dFLEXE_PIDM[i] or dFLEXE_PMM[i] set for any PHY or PIDs are not unique.
Deactivation: dFLEXE_PIDM[i] and dFLEXE_PMM[i] not set for any PHY and al PIDs are unique.
FlexE PHY Map Mismatch Defect Correlation (Per FlexE (sub)group)
cFLEXE_PMM <- dFLEXE_PMM and (not dFLEXE_GIDM) and (not dLOM) and (not AI_TSF)
FlexE PHY Map Mismatch Defect Correlation (Per FlexE (sub)group)
cFLEXE_PMM <- dFLEXE_PMM and (not dFLEXE_GIDM) and (not CI_SSF)
Client Calendar Slot Unavailability Mismatch (Per FlexE PHY)
Activation: One or more of the calendar slots listed as unavailable (expected) are not carrying the value 0xFFFF (unavailable) within the active client calendar overhead in the FlexE PHY.
Deactivation: All of the calendar slots listed as unavailable (expected) are carrying the value 0xFFFF (unavailable) within the active client calendar overhead in the FlexE PHY.
Client Calendar Slot Unavailability Mismatch (Per FlexE (sub)group)
Activation: One or more of the calendar slots listed as unavailable (expected) are not carrying the value 0xFFFF (unavailable) within the active client calendar overhead in the FlexE (sub)group.
Deactivation: All of the calendar slots listed as unavailable (expected) are carrying the value 0xFFFF (unavailable) within the active client calendar overhead in the FlexE (sub)group.
Client Calendar Slot Unavailability Mismatch Defect Correlation (Per FlexE Group)
cCSUM <- dCUSM and (not dLOL) and (not dPMM) and (not dGIDM) and (not CI_SSF)
Client Calendar Slot Unavailability Mismatch Defect Correlation (Per FlexE Group)
cCSUM <- dCSUM and (not dCSF) and (not dPLM) and (not AI_TSF)
Activation: calendar A is active and accepted calendar A is not equal to expected calendar A or calendar B is active and accepted calendar B is not equal to expected calendar B.
Deactivation: calendar A is active and accepted calendar A is equal to expected calendar A or calendar B is active and accepted calendar B is equal to expected calendar B.
Client Calendar Mismatch Defect Correlation (Per FlexE client)
FlexE Remote Defect Indication (Per FlexE PHY)
Activation: received RPF =1 for a FlexE frame with good CRC.
Deactivation: received RPF=0 for a FlexE frame with good CRC.
FlexE Remote Defect Indication Defect Correlation (Per FlexE PHY)
Activation: last FlexE frame received with reserved bits not set to all zeros.
Deactivation: last FlexE frame received with reserved bits set to all zeros.
Activation: N consecutive FlexE frame received with LF pattern on row 2 and 3 while dFLEXE_OOF=0.
Deactivation: N consecutive FlexE frame received without LF pattern on row 2 and 3 or dFLEXE_OOF=1.
Activation: last FlexE frame received with CRC error.
Deactivation: last FlexE frame received with good CRC.
FlexE PHY CCC Mismatch (Per FlexE PHY)
Activation: One of the received C bit is different than the other 2 received C bits..
Deactivation: All 3 received C bit are identical.
Activation: Received active calendar is not the same for all PHY within the FlexE (sub)group.
Deactivation: Received active calendar is the same for all PHY within the FlexE (sub)group.
FlexE Sync Header Error (Per FlexE PHY)
Activation: Received sync header different than 01 for FlexE OH row #2 or #3.
Deactivation: received sync header equal to 01 for FlexE OH row #2 and #3.
FlexE Group Overhead Multi Frame (Per FlexE (sub)group)
Activation: Received OMF not equal for all the PHYs within a (sub)group after FlexE deskew..
Deactivation: Received OMF equal for all PHYs within a (sub)group after deskew.
